help-file.title: "POWER WORD BLIND"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Permanent until healed Type of spell: Generic
This spell permanently blind a victim with less than certain amount of life force, with the amount determined by the spellcaster's proficiency. The blindness can only be removed via a "Cure Blind" or more powerful healing spell.
